author: IGN
description:
These videos were made to celebrate a GameCube classic entering the Nintendo Switch 2 Online catalogue!

Set sail across the Great Sea with us as we uncover every item upgrade in The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker! Whether you're playing the HD version or the original GameCube release, this guide will show you where to find all the essential upgrades to prepare Link for his showdown with Ganondorf.
What You'll Find in This Video:
Wallet Upgrades – Carry up to 5,000 rupees
Bomb Bag Upgrades – Max out at 99 bombs
Quiver Upgrades – Fire away with 99 arrows
Magic Meter Upgrade – Double your magic
Hurricane Spin – Learn this powerful sword technique
Deluxe Picto Box – Unlock new side quests with color photography

00:00 - Intro  
00:29 - Wallet Upgrades  
01:36 - Bomb Bag Upgrades  
02:28 - Quiver Upgrades  
03:26 - Magic Upgrade  
04:09 - Hurricane Spin  
05:18 - Deluxe Picto Box

#IGN #Gaming
title: Zelda: The Wind Waker - All Item Upgrade Locations

Check out the Release Date Trailer for Tides of Tomorrow, a first-person multiplayer adventure game developed by DigixArt. Players will embark on a mission to find a cure by travelling through the floating towns and villages across the sea on the oceanic planet of Elynd. With a revolutionary multiplayer component, players will change the story for other players based on their actions and choices within the game itself. Tides of Tomorrow is launching on February 24, 2026 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

description:
Check out the new trailer for Ghost of Yotei, the stunning open-world sequel to Ghost of Tsushima coming from Sucker Punch Productions. The story follows a haunted, lone mercenary named Atsu. Thirsty for revenge, she travels through the beautiful, rugged landscapes of northern Japan, hunting those who killed her family many years earlier. Ghost of Yotei is set to release on PlayStation 5 October 2, 2025.

author: IGN
description:
Silent Hill f gets a new trailer and a release date announcement during the Sony PlayStation State of Play 2025 showcase. Watch the Silent Hill f release date trailer for this upcoming psychological horror game. The new Silent Hill f trailer shows terrifying enemies you'll face, gives a peek at gameplay, and more. Silent Hill f will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam, Windows, and Epic Games Store) on September 25, 2025.
 

Experience the beauty hidden within terror in this new Japanese psychological horror game. In Ebisugaoka, a secluded town, Hinako Shimizu's once-familiar home transforms into a haunting nightmare as a sudden fog envelops the area. As the town falls silent and the fog thickens, Hinako must navigate the twisted paths of Ebisugaoka, solving complex puzzles and confronting grotesque monsters to survive. Will Hinako discover the beauty hidden within terror, or will she succumb to the madness that lies ahead? 

#IGN #PlayStation
title: Silent Hill f - Official Release Date Trailer (Japanese Audio) | State of Play 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Reveal Trailer for Madden NFL 26, the latest addition to the football simulation franchise developed by EA Sports. Players can make use of a host of new features such as a new AI-powered machine learning system trained on thousands of plays from nearly a decade of real NFL data to deliver more explosive gameplay - with new player-specific traits, authentic play-styles, and adaptive counters that match on-field tendencies and strategies of NFL quarterbacks and coaches. Get a look at some new shots from Madden NFL 26, launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5) and Xbox Series X|S.

#MaddenNFL26 #Gaming #IGN
title: Madden NFL 26 - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Keep calm and carry on. Check out the new Heads of State trailer for the upcoming action-comedy movie starring Idris Elba, John Cena, Priyanka Chopra Jonas, Carla Gugino, Jack Quaid, Stephen Root, Sarah Niles, Richard Coyle and Paddy Considine.

In the action-comedy Heads of State, the UK Prime Minister Sam Clarke (Idris Elba) and U.S. President Will Derringer (John Cena) have a not-so-friendly and very public rivalry that jeopardizes their countries’ “special relationship.” But when they become the targets of a powerful and ruthless foreign adversary—who proves more than a match for the two leaders’ security forces—they are begrudgingly forced to rely on the only two people they can trust: each other. Ultimately allied with the brilliant MI6 agent Noel Bisset (Priyanka Chopra Jonas), they must go on the run and find a way to work together long enough to thwart a global conspiracy that threatens the entire free world.

The screenplay for Heads of State is by Josh Appelbaum & André Nem
title: Heads of State - Official Final Trailer (2025) John Cena, Idris Elba, Priyanka Chopra Jonas

author: IGN
description:
Here are the best Nintendo launch games of all time. From our favourite GameCube launch title Luigi's Mansion and the unique StreetPass on Nintendo 3DS, to Twilight Princess on the Nintendo Wii, and the iconic platformer that started it all, Super Mario Bros. on the Nintendo Entertainment System, and more!

We've put together the 10 best Nintendo launch games of all time, ranging from the best Nintendo 64 launch games to the very best Nintendo Switch game that came on day one. We also celebrate Tetris on the Game Boy, and a launch day classic Super Nintendo game.

00:00: Intro
00:34: Luigi’s Mansion (Nintendo GameCube)
02:59: Nintendo Land (Nintendo Wii U)
05:03: StreetPass (Nintendo 3DS)
06:34: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess (Nintendo Wii)
07:54: Super Mario World (Super Nintendo)
09:12: Tetris (Game Boy)
10:57: Super Mario Bros. (Nintendo Entertainment System)
12:28: Number 3
14:35: Number 2
15:58: Number 1
17:30: Outro

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo #Switch2
title: The Top 10 Best Nintendo Launch Games of All Time

description:
Watch the Elena Update Launch Trailer for Street Fighter 6, the latest in the iconic fighting game franchise developed by Capcom. Players can now access a suite of new content with the latest update, including Elena's Combo Trials, the ability to explore the Battle Balance Update, new customization options, and more quality of life improvements. The Elena Update for Street Fighter 6 is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC (Steam).

#StreetFighter6 #Elena #Gaming
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Elena Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Mecha BREAK is a multiplayer third-person shooter filled with high-octane ground and aerial combat that makes the Mecha Dream a reality. Then came their Steam Next Fest Open Beta. The beta peaked with 317,000 concurrent players and played by over 3.5 million players total, resulting in Mecha BREAK hitting the top 5 most wishlisted games. Despite the success, the open beta was met with feedback from the community. MECHA BREAK's beta sparked intense discussions, and now, Seasun Games faces its toughest battle yet—refining the game before its full release.

Join IGN's Max Scoville as he sits down with Amazing Season Games CEO, Kris Kwok to talk about the feedback from the open beta and what lies ahead.

Presented by Amazing Season Games.

#IGN
title: Mecha BREAK Acknowledges Open Beta Feedback - Make or Break Ep. 1

author: IGN
description:
When Zephyr, a rebellious surfer, is abducted by a shark-obsessed serial killer and held captive on his boat, she must figure out how to escape before he carries out a ritualistic feeding to the sharks below. 

Jai Courtney (The Suicide Squad), Hassie Harrison (Yellowstone), and Josh Heuston (Dune: Prophecy) star. Directed by Sean Byrnes, Dangerous Animals opens in theaters on June 6, 2025.

#IGN
title: Dangerous Animals - Exclusive Clip (2025) Jai Courtney, Ella Newton

author: IGN
description:
We sat down with Tim Sweeney, Founder and CEO of Epic Games, and Saxs Persson, EVP of Fortnite Ecosystem, to discuss the future of Fortnite! From Unreal Engine 5.6, to the Unreal Editor for Fortnite, allowing AI-powered developer tools and access to IPs such as LEGO, Avatar: The Last Airbender, Star Wars, and more.

With further AI-assisted updates arriving to Fortnite, Tim discusses whether or not the next Breath of the Wild, or GTA, could really be made with AI, as well as what AI game development means for the future of Epic.

With Star Wars Unreal Engine for Fortnite, and the Unreal Editor for Fortnite Lego Update, Fortnite is bigger than ever, and both Tim and Saxs discuss what's next after Unreal Fest 2025.

#fortnite #ign #summerofgaming
title: Tim Sweeney on The Future of Fortnite and AI Game Development

author: IGN
description:
Check out 20 minutes of gameplay from Discounty, the upcoming cozy pixel-art supermarket management sim. It will be released on PC and consoles this Summer. 
Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2274620/Discounty/
title: Discounty: 20 Minutes of Exclusive Gameplay

author: IGN
description:
Their greatest strength is each other. Check out the latest The Fantastic Four: First Steps teaser trailer for another look at this upcoming MCU film. The Fantastic Four: First Steps opens in theaters on July 25, 2025.

Set against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro- futuristic world, Marvel Studios’ The Fantastic Four: First Steps introduces Marvel’s First Family—Reed Richards/Mister Fantastic (Pedro Pascal), Sue Storm/Invisible Woman (Vanessa Kirby), Johnny Storm/Human Torch (Joseph Quinn) and Ben Grimm/The Thing (Ebon Moss-Bachrach) as they face their most daunting challenge yet. Forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, they must defend Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus (Ralph Ineson) and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer (Julia Garner). And if Galactus’ plan to devour the entire planet and everyone on it weren’t bad enough, it suddenly gets very personal. 

The action adventure also stars Paul Walter Hauser, John
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Pedro Pascal, Joseph Quinn

author: IGN
description: Check out the Beacon Update Launch Trailer for No Man's Sky, an upcoming content update for the hit action-adventure space exploration game developed by Hello Games. Players will soon be able to access this extensive update, making key changes to the game's settlements. Manage a town, organize production, complete upgrades, and more to create a settlement to your exact specifications. The Beacon Update for No Man's Sky is available now for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, macOS, and PC (Steam).
title: No Man's Sky - Official Beacon Update Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at the Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Trailer for No Man's Sky, the action-adventure space exploration game developed by Hello Games. Players can take their No Man's Sky journey on the go, whether they're starting out brand new on Nintendo Switch 2 or continuing their progression on the new handheld with crossplay and cross-save being supported at launch. Players will also be able to access new content with the Beacon Update launching alongside the Nintendo Switch 2 launch. No Man's Sky is launching on June 5 for Nintendo Switch 2.
title: No Man's Sky - Official Nintendo Switch 2 Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Game of Thrones: Kingsroad reviewed by Sarah Thwaites on PC, also available on iOS and Android.

Game of Thrones: Kingsroad attempts to respect its source material, imbuing its impressively recreated map of Westeros with grand architecture and appropriately grim side quests. Unfortunately, behind every interesting or well-thought-out idea is a frustrating pay wall, unsightly NPC animation, or grindy roadblock that halts any momentum you’ve worked up. And the passable combat that acts as the foundation of this action-RPG isn’t deep enough to make vaulting those hurdles much fun on its own. There’s plenty to get up to in this intricate reimagining of the TV show’s world, but ultimately, when you play the Game of Thrones: Kingsroad, you pay or you die.
title: Game of Thrones: Kingsroad Review
